pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiyaṁ bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.4: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.5: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.6: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.9: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:1.11: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.1.2: upasampanno upasampannaṁ hasādhippāyo kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī aṅgulipatodakena hāseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc52:2.2.10: Anupasampannaṁ kāyena kāyaṁ āmasati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
